'''1.21.90.1''' is the sixth and final Preview version for [[Minecraft Education 1.21.90]], released on June 16, 2025, which adds features from the [[Chase the Skies]] drop.<ref>{{cite|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/33201022766356-What-s-New-in-the-Beta-v1-21-90-1|title=What's New in the Beta v1.21.90.1|website=Minecraft Education Support|date=June 18, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.21.90}}
*Added features from [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.90]], '''[[Chase the Skies]]'''.
**Except [[Vibrant Visuals]].
*Added [[spectator]] mode from [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.50]].
*Added new [[superflat]] changes from [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.80]].
*Added [[Ore UI]] for new world screen from [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.20]].
*Added read/write file functionality with MakeCode.

== Changes ==
'''Code Builder IDE Changes'''
*Tynker has been removed as a supported IDE.
*In-game notifications were added so everyone is aware of the upcoming changes.</onlyinclude>
